key_risks: Economic Sensitivity: Exposure to regional economic fluctuations in agriculture, energy, and real estate sectors.
Regulatory Risks: Ongoing scrutiny and compliance costs from federal and state regulators.
Integration Risks: Challenges from the 2022 acquisition of Great Western Bancorp, including operational integration and customer retention.
Competitive Pressures: Increasing competition from larger national banks and fintech companies.
controversies: Legal case involving allegations of misuse of confidential information.
environmental_issues: None explicitly mentioned, though the company has launched green lending and renewable energy financing programs.
social_issues: Community Focus: Emphasis on community banking and local development initiatives.
governance_issues: Potential internal governance risks highlighted by the legal case involving misuse of confidential information.

sources.title: First Interstate BancSystem, Great Western Bancorp complete merger
